subject: Soccer
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Toronto F.C. beat the Red Bulls, 2-1, on Tuesday night to clinch its first playoff appearance, with Sebastian Giovinco scoring his 22nd goal of the season.
snippet: Toronto F.C. beat the Red Bulls, 2-1, on Tuesday night to clinch its first playoff appearance, with Sebastian Giovinco scoring his 22nd goal of the season.
